channel.title: New format idea
channel.description:
[b]Question:[/b] [i](put the question you have or what you need help with)[/i]
[b]Server Base:[/b] [i](put the server base you have the question on) if its not a server base just say no[/i]
[b]Type:[/b] [i](put the Type of question you have like Private server or codes)[/i]
Ok we should start using this format becuase it will clean up tons of nooby nonsense

item.title: New format idea
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

Development/Help

do you see the help in there and do you see the development part it what does development mean make what does help mean ok then[br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2007, 01:41:07 AM[/size][hr][quote=“JxS, post:8, topic:49508”][quote author=zammyking111 link=topic=69428.msg794736#msg794736 date=1169282183]
cool i sent the link too moparscape and see if he likes it and i told him if he doesnt like it too just delete it and if he likes it just pin it
[/quote]
*moparisthebest

And also, its Development/Help

If you only had Question’s, people wouldn’t be able to show off what they’ve made.

[quote]
RS2 Server Development/Help
Show off what you have done, help with errors and so forth.
[/quote][/quote]
and just too be correcting you sense you did that too me
RS2 Server Development/Help
Show off what you have done, help with errors and so forth.
lemme just point out that bold spot what does it say
Help with errors and so forth[br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2007, 01:43:40 AM[/size][hr]Comon we should use this format

Read full topic

item.title: New format idea
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

That format cannot be used in general. This section is not just for coding help. You can also ask questions about hamachi and NO-IP. So when you create a format be sure to consider all possible topics.

Read full topic
